This class is used to create cards according to the Risk rules.

cardRewardArmy - Variable in class src.model.Card

cardType - Variable in class src.model.Card

CardView - Class in src.view
This is the class that shows card information
CardView() - Constructor for class src.view.CardView
 
Cheater - Class in src.model
Cheater: computer player strategy whose reinforce() method doubles the number of armies on all its countries, whose attack() method automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries, and whose fortify() method doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
Cheater() - Constructor for class src.model.Cheater
 
checkCardValue() - Method in class src.view.CardView
Check card value to see if the sum is less than 3
checkDiceValue() - Method in class src.view.AttackView
Check dice value to see f the dice values are correct.
